headline: Building out the Product Marketing Function @ Pemo üöÄ
summary: As a marketing manager at Imagine, I leverage my data-driven and customer-focused approach to create and execute marketing strategies that drive customer acquisition and retention. With over six years of experience in the marketing field, I have developed a passion for delivering innovative and impactful campaigns that resonate with the target audience and achieve the business goals. Some of the campaigns that I am most proud of include the Sunday World's 'If it's going on, it's going in' campaign, which won an ICAD award for the best integrated campaign in 2020, and Virgin Media's 'Red Friday' sales campaign, which was shortlisted for the smartest acquisition/win back strategy in the An Post Smart Marketing Awards 2019. I also launched Virgin Media Play Magazine, which won a silver award for customer engagement strategy in 2018. At Imagine, I continue to apply my expertise in integrated campaigns to grow the brand awareness and loyalty of our broadband services.

headline: Content Marketing Manager | SEO & Digital Strategy Expert | Social Media Engagement Advocate | Brand Growth Innovator
summary: As a dynamic Content Marketing Manager with over 4 years of experience, I specialize in driving brand engagement and growth within the luxury goods, fintech, and technology sectors. My expertise lies in crafting innovative content strategies that not only captivate audiences but also enhance search engine visibility through effective SEO optimization. Proven track record of fostering customer loyalty and brand awareness through strategic social media management and community engagement initiatives. By collaborating closely with cross-functional teams, I align marketing efforts with broader business objectives, ensuring that all campaigns deliver measurable results and elevate brand presence across digital platforms. Passionate about connecting with fellow professionals and exchanging insights in the ever-evolving landscape of content marketing. Let‚Äôs connect and explore opportunities to collaborate and grow together!
